text: anaeleul manjiji anh-assgeona hog-eun anaeleul wihae jichamgeum-eul jijeonghaji anh-ass-eul gyeong-ueneun geudaedeul-i geunyeodeulgwa ihonhanda hadeolado geudaedeul-egeneun joega eobsnola. geudaedeul-eun, hyeongpyeon-i neogneoghan janeun jasin-ui neunglyeog-e geolmajge, hyeongpyeon-i eolyeoun jado jasin-ui neunglyeog-e geolmajge, geunyeodeul-ege habdanghan geum-aeg-ui wijalyoleul jibulhaeya hani, ineun choeseon-eul dahaneun ja-ege bugwadoen uimu sahang-ila
